diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BD$ is $18$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $24$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $2x + 1$ units.
The length of the line $AC$ is $3x - 1$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line segment $BC$.
The measure of angle $BAD$ is equal to the measure of angle $DAC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, forming a triangle $ABD$.
There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $CD$, forming a triangle $BCD$.
